name: DONKEY.APP
description:
Play the great grandma of all racing games on your Apple TV, Watch, and iPhone! DONKEY.APP is a super simple but frustratingly hard retro arcade game, inspired by Bill Gates' one-and-only DOS game!

For the first time on tvOS, watchOS, and iOS, relive the classic game that started it all! Beat the DONKEYS and become the top driver you're born to be!

"Homage in its true 8-bit glory" Mashable
"Undeniably cool" Cult of Mac
"A harder version of Frogger" TNW
"Retro gaming is all the rage" MacObserver

# Special shoutout to Bill Gates :)


P.S. use the digital crown on Apple Watch.
